title: The first beta of Paranoid Android Sapphire is now available for the OnePlus 9 and OnePlus 9 Pro
content:
The Paranoid Android team has just released the first beta build of Paranoid Android Sapphire ROM for the OnePlus 9 and OnePlus 9 Pro. An Alpha release of the Android 12-based ROM has been available for both phones for some time now. However, the new beta version promises a more stable software experience. As announced

The post The first beta of Paranoid Android Sapphire is now available for the OnePlus 9 and OnePlus 9 Pro appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Paranoid Android team has released the first beta build of Paranoid Android Sapphire ROM for the OnePlus 9 and OnePlus 9 Pro.
